statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_level < 10 AND optimal_stock_level > 20;
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity > 50;
DELETE FROM delivery_schedules WHERE delivery_date < '2022-03-15' OR quantity_delivered IS NULL;
DELETE FROM delivery_schedule WHERE delivery_date = '2022-09-30' AND delivery_time = '14:00:00';
DELETE FROM stockout_history WHERE stockout_reason = 'Damaged Product' AND stockout_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Example Product';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE id = 5 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM supplier WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
